instructions: Combine peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, ginger, honey, sriracha sauce, sesame oil, and garlic in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Add coconut milk; cook and stir until sauce is thickened to your desired consistency, 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon sriracha sauce, or to taste
title: Thai-Style Peanut Stir-Fry Sauce
